Rulings.Base:
1. Sending 1 "Ice Barrier" monster to the GY is a cost.
2. You choose when during the End Phase to stop applying this effect.
3. If this effect has already resolved and "Skill Drain" is activated later during the turn, this card's effect will still be applied.
4. If this card becomes face-down in a Chain with its effect or after its effect resolves, its effect will no longer apply.
